parameters.name: ArrayRequest
parameters.description:
The job array.

Format: X-Y:Z. X is the minimum index value. Y is the maximum index value. Z is the step size. For example, 2-7:2 indicates that three jobs need to be run and their index values are 2, 4, and 6.

parameters.name: ClockTime
parameters.description:
The maximum running time of the job. Valid formats:

*   hh:mm:ss
*   mm:ss
*   ss

We recommend that you use the hh:mm:ss format. If the maximum running time is 12 hours, set the value to 12:00:00.

parameters.name: CommandLine
parameters.description: The command that is used to run the job.

parameters.name: Gpu
parameters.description:
The maximum GPU usage required by a single compute node. Valid values: 1 to 8.

The parameter takes effect only when the cluster uses PBS and a compute node is a GPU-accelerated instance.

parameters.name: InputFileUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the job files that are uploaded to an Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.

parameters.name: Mem
parameters.description: The maximum memory usage required by a single compute node. Unit: GB, MB, or KB. The unit is case-insensitive.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the job template. The name must be 2 to 64 characters in length. It must start with a letter and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_).

parameters.name: Node
parameters.description:
The number of compute nodes. Valid values: 1 to 500.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the Task, Thread, Mem, or GPU parameters do not take effect.

parameters.name: PackagePath
parameters.description: The path that is used to run the job.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description:
The priority of the job. Valid values: 0 to 9. A larger value indicates a higher priority.

Default value: 0.

parameters.name: Queue
parameters.description:
The name of the queue in which the job is run.

You can call the [ListQueues](~~92176~~) operation to query the name of the queue.

parameters.name: ReRunable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to automatically rerun the job after the job fails. Valid value:

*   true: reruns the job.
*   false: does not rerun the job.

parameters.name: RunasUser
parameters.description:
The name of the user that runs the job.

You can call the [ListUsers](~~188572~~) operation to query the users of the cluster.

parameters.name: StderrRedirectPath
parameters.description: The output file path of stderr.

parameters.name: StdoutRedirectPath
parameters.description: The output file path of stdout.

parameters.name: Task
parameters.description: The number of tasks required by a single compute node. Valid values: 1 to 1000.

parameters.name: Thread
parameters.description: The number of threads required by a single compute node. Valid values: 1 to 1000.

parameters.name: UnzipCmd
parameters.description:
The command that is used to decompress the job files downloaded from an OSS bucket. The parameter takes effect only when WithUnzipCmd is set to true. Valid values:

*   tar xzf: decompresses GZIP files.
*   tar xf: decompresses TAR files.
*   unzip: decompresses ZIP files.

parameters.name: Variables
parameters.description: The runtime variables passed to the job. They can be accessed by using environment variables in the executable file.

parameters.name: WithUnzipCmd
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to decompress the job files downloaded from an OSS bucket. Valid values:

*   true: decompresses the job file.
*   false: does not decompress the job file.
